effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,658, up to 13,292.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.8 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 411,703 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 114,363 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
